00085 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccProfileIdDesc
00086 {
00087 public:
00088   CIccProfileIdDesc();
00089   CIccProfileIdDesc(CIccProfile &profile);
00090   CIccProfileIdDesc(icProfileID id, CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode desc);
00091   CIccProfileIdDesc(const CIccProfileIdDesc &pid);
00092   CIccProfileIdDesc &operator=(const CIccProfileIdDesc &pid);
00093 
00094   void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
00095 
00096   bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
00097   bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
00098 
00099   icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccProfile* pProfile=NULL) const;
00100 
00101   CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode m_desc;
00102   icProfileID m_profileID;
00103 };

00105 typedef std::list<CIccProfileIdDesc> CIccProfileIdDescList;

00114 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccTagProfileSequenceId : public CIccTag
00115 {
00116 public:
00117   CIccTagProfileSequenceId();
00118   CIccTagProfileSequenceId(const CIccTagProfileSequenceId &lut);
00119   CIccTagProfileSequenceId &operator=(const CIccTagProfileSequenceId &lut);
00120   virtual CIccTag *NewCopy() const { return new CIccTagProfileSequenceId(*this);}
00121   virtual ~CIccTagProfileSequenceId();
00122 
00123   static CIccTagProfileSequenceId *ParseMem(icUInt8Number *pMem, icUInt32Number size);
00124 
00125   virtual icTagTypeSignature GetType() { return icSigProfileSequceIdType; }
00126   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() { return "CIccTagProfileSequenceId"; }
00127 
00128   virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
00129 
00130   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
00131   virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
00132 
00133   virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccProfile* pProfile=NULL) const;
00134 
00135   bool AddProfileDescription(CIccProfile &profile) { return AddProfileDescription(CIccProfileIdDesc(profile)); }
00136   bool AddProfileDescription(const CIccProfileIdDesc &profileDesc);
00137 
00138   CIccProfileIdDesc *GetFirst();
00139   CIccProfileIdDesc *GetLast();
00140 
00141   CIccProfileIdDescList::iterator begin() { return m_list->begin(); }
00142   CIccProfileIdDescList::iterator end() { return m_list->end(); }
00143 
00144 protected:
00145   void Cleanup();
00146 
00147   CIccProfileIdDescList *m_list;
00148 };
